resources.string: To use Highlight, please sign in with one of the services below:

Highlight is based on real identity and mutual friends. Using these services allows us to show you how you\'re connected to the people around you. It also makes it super easy to create a Highlight profile.
Please let us know if you have feedback on this or if you would like to log in with another identity service. Thanks!
We won\'t post things without your permission.
